Hello My Name Is Matt Bertino

I am a Front End Developer, with a background in Big Data

I used to be a business analyst at Resurgent Capital Services managing strategic efforts and business lines for the agency world. Now I'm a Front End Developer and recent grad of The Iron Yard Academy. What can we make together?

mattbertino@gmail.com

Work

At The Iron Yard, I developed real applications. Check them out!

Front Office

A Sport Team Management Application

Front Office was my final project at The Iron Yard. Built on Parse with Backbone, Front Office allows team organizers to manage players, coaches, events and team communications.

Rotten Movies

How Rotten Are The Movies

Rotten Movies is an application I built using Backbone and the Rotten Tomotoes API. This was my introduction to APIs, routers and JSON.

Yard Talk

A Chat Application

Yard Talk is a chat application like HipChat. This was my first Backbone application using MongoDB.
